/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in shades of white and beige, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The street itself is a hive of activity with cars and bicycles parked along the sides, hinting at the city's preferred modes of transportation. The image is bathed in the soft glow of daylight, with the sun casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
